title: I Need Help!
body: Hi i had a PBE Account a while back and dont remember it how can i get my PBE Account back thank you : )

replies.body: No worries bud! Reach out to our accounts team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and once you can verify that you were the original creator they can help you get back onto PBE.

Well when you read this thank you : )
(If i could get in touch with live support that would be great)
Hey, This has happened i got in touch with my PBE Account Again But in one day i have lost access i think someone has hacked it please help me : )
